attributes.title: 20 Years of SHREK: Not Just A Meme? - Movie Podcast
attributes.caption: Potential spoilers.
attributes.description:
Go to http://hellofresh.com/80filmhaus and use code 80filmhaus to get a total of $80 off across 5 boxes, including free shipping on your first box!
Visit http://att.com/5G for more information on AT&T 5G!

This April marks 20 years since the lovable anti-hero Shrek first hurled mud at the silver screen. An Ogre with as many layers as a stinky old onion, he captured the hearts of movie-goers, spawning three sequels and an endless wealth of memes. The soundtrack solidified the enduring relevance of Smash Mouth, and the box office take and critical recognition established DreamWorks Animation as a substantial competitor to Pixar. There’s even a musical. Today we re-examine this children’s classic two decades later, and look to the future of the franchise. Plus, Ryan's Recommendation!

http://twitter.com/elysewillems
https://twitter.com/adamkovic
